title: Invoking Amazon API Gateway private custom domain name cross-account
description: Setting up cross-account Private Amazon API Gateway with custom domain

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to implement cross-account access to a Private API Gateway using Custom Domain Names. Learn how to configure, deploy, and invoke private APIs across AWS accounts
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Luigi Napoleone Capasso
authors.bio: Luigi Napoleone Capasso is a Technical Account Manager at Amazon Web Services.
